name: Trip 2: Trip War [Amiga]
description:
A game by Jasper Byrne, creator of the award-winning Lone Survivor for PC/Mac/Wii U/PS3/PS4/PS Vita.

Made in 1995, after releasing 'Keith's Quest' the same year on F1 Licenseware. Though complete, Trip 2: Trip War was never released until now.  It is a two-player only strategy-dogfighting hybrid.

You are daring pilots of lightning-fast Trip Ships in the year 2060, embroiled in a bitter war. Who will be victorious?

The aim is to shoot down your opponent, while collecting powerups to increase your speed, shot power and shield.

In War Mode, the players must also play a turn-based strategy game to aquire territory on the map, building and upgrading while sending your Trip Ships into combat.

For Amiga with 1mb+ ram. 2 Player only.

Tested on A4000/030 / stock A1200.  May not work on emulation.


* * * 

Author's note:

I am releasing this as Pay What You Want, in the hope of raising some additional funds for my new game, a project I've been working on for over eight years. If you liked Lone Survivor and want to help my next game along, this would be a great way of supporting me!

Thanks, 

Jasper
